item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Boot_Parameter_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest_Boot_Parameter_Type Service Datatype Description Describes a virtual guest boot parameter. In this the word class is used in the context of arguments sent to cloud computing instances such as single user mode and boot into bash. Local bootOption Available boot options. Type: string createDate Type: dateTime description A description of the boot parameter Type: string id Indentifier for record.
